name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live ＂SuperNova＂ [_o_mtN68KEg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Opening montage for Hoshimachi Suisei's 'SuperNova' live at Nippon Budokan, featuring venue shots and space-themed visuals.

subtitles.original:
Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live
SUPERNOVA
subtitles.english:
Hoshimachi Suisei Nippon Budokan Live
SUPERNOVA

subtitles.original: つまんないって吠ざんね　奇跡願ってるだけの人生
subtitles.english: Don't bark that it's boring, a life just wishing for miracles.

subtitles.original: Watch me do-do-do-do to the hi-hi-hit trick な粋の magic
subtitles.english: Watch me do-do-do-do to the hi-hi-hit trick, a stylish magic.

subtitles.original: I wanna be free だってまだ feel us...
subtitles.english: I wanna be free, because I still feel us...

subtitles.original: 兵隊靴に　ちょっと宇宙まで
subtitles.english: In soldier boots, off to space for a bit.

subtitles.original: 秒針は音立てないで　夜を急かす魔物のよう
subtitles.english: The second hand makes no sound, like a monster rushing the night.

subtitles.original: 人生は一瞬にして　解ける魔法
subtitles.english: Life is a magic that dissolves in an instant.

subtitles.original: それならば駆け抜けてみたいの my baby
subtitles.english: If that's the case, I want to run through it, my baby.

subtitles.original: おしゃまなパソで飛び出す世界　私は大変身 make up
subtitles.english: Dashing out into the world with cheeky steps, I'll have a big transformation, make up.

subtitles.original: わがまま money money きらめきに chu chu
subtitles.english: Selfish money money, chu chu to the sparkle.

subtitles.original: 空の間で dancing さよなら goodbye bitter
subtitles.english: Dancing in the space of the sky, farewell, goodbye bitter.

subtitles.original: いつかは喝采クラップ audience　みなみなご唱和あれ
subtitles.english: Someday, applause and claps from the audience, everyone sing along.

subtitles.original: こんがらがってもしょうがない
subtitles.english: It's no use getting all tangled up.
